aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-4170-829 at Sector East Station

defect_observed.value: Communication radio frequency drift. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Mission Computer component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 23/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 25/02/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 28/02/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 28/02/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 03/03/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Communication radio frequency drift. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Mission Computer component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
